attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Superpowered Throw

attacks.name: Absorb

name: Arven
rules: Search your deck for an Item card and a Pokémon Tool card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Beach Court
rules: The Retreat Cost of each Basic Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) is Colorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Crushing Hammer
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Defiance Band
rules: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, the attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Electric Generator
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and attach up to 2 Basic Lightning Energy cards you find there to your Benched Lightning Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Search
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Jacq
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Evolution Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Judge
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Katy
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 8 cards. Your turn ends.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Mesagoza
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player searches their deck for a Pokémon, reveals it, and puts it into their hand. Then, that player shuffles their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Miriam
rules: Shuffle up to 5 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck. If you shuffled any cards into your deck in this way, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nemona
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nest Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pal Pad
rules: Shuffle up to 2 Supporter cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Penny
rules: Put 1 of your Basic Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Picnic Basket
rules: Heal 30 damage from each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokégear 3.0
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Supporter card you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Catcher
rules: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rock Chestplate
rules: The Fighting Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Rocky Helmet
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Star Grunt
rules: Put an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon on top of their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Vitality Band
rules: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Youngster
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Springy
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Graveyard Gamboling
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage for each Psychic Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Adrenaline Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Intimidating Howl
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Knickknack Carrying
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.

abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.text: Your Basic Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Nest Stash
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may shuffle your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put any cards on the bottom of your deck in this way, draw a card.

abilities.name: Trap Territory
abilities.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Wire Hang
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Raging Claws
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tyrannical Tail
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 180 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulse Launcher
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Tandem Unit
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Lightning Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Photon Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Psychic Embrace
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Psychic Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use this Ability on a Pokémon that would be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Miracle Force
attacks.text: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Everlasting Darkness
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, they can’t play any Item cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 60 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

attacks.name: Bedrock Breaker
attacks.text: Discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Gigantic Tusks
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Dino Cry
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to your Basic Fighting Pokémon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Wild Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Toxic Ripper
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 6 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

attacks.name: Triple Laser
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Cybernetic Wheels
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maddening Scent
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heavy Stomp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Arven
rules: Search your deck for an Item card and a Pokémon Tool card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Jacq
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Evolution Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Katy
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 8 cards. Your turn ends.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Miriam
rules: Shuffle up to 5 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck. If you shuffled any cards into your deck in this way, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Penny
rules: Put 1 of your Basic Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Star Grunt
rules: Put an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon on top of their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Trap Territory
abilities.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Wire Hang
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.

abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Lightning Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Wild Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Nest Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
